snippet.title: Margoqs' Lair - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
This is the announcement trailer for the roguelike hack'n'slash dungeon crawler "Margoq's Lair" by Zillo Games.  https://store.steampowered.com/app/2516550/Margoqs_Lair

Demo is out now on Steam - so try it out and wishlist today!

Newsletter signup: www.zillogames.com
Discord server: https://discord.gg/gDq85ZpBJy
